article_title: Moncton restaurants adapt to COVID-19 concerns
article_description: At least one restaurant owner in Moncton is taking extra precautions after the province s first case of COVID 19 was confirmed in a resident who lives in the area
article_content: At least one restaurant owner in Moncton is taking extra precautions after the province s first case of COVID 19 was confirmed in a resident who lives in the area This means additional cleaning and fewer tables in dining areas in hopes that customers keep c   1521 chars
